title: The Week in pictures. Issue no. 294
brief_description: Newsreel items include: The happenings and description of charm schools; renowned variety stars - The Voltaires; pupils at the Royal Navy Gunnery School get cracking under realistic training conditions; the World’s largest road vehicle, The Antar, on display before being shipped to the Middle east; Joe Davis, snooker champion shows of his skilled wares at the table.
